definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash

sentences.english: A walnut sundae,and don't spare the whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 做胡桃圣代冰淇淋，就甭想少用掼奶渍。

sentences.english: He topped the cake with whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 他在蛋糕上浇了掼奶油。

sentences.english: When the cake has cooled decorate with whipped cream and cherries.
sentences.chinese: 可以配上一些樱桃和掼奶油一起食用。

sentences.english: If you want to learn more , I can fetch you Guide to China .
sentences.chinese: 如果你想了解更多，我可以拿《中国掼》给你。

definition: to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
with a lightning move of the hand
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
to fall headlong/(fig.) to suffer an ignominious failure
lit. without head, without face (idiom)/fig. frenzily/haphazardly
to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
with a crash/with a thunderous noise
